name: A Sniper Assassin - Elite Commando Shooter At War
name_original: A Sniper Assassin - Elite Commando Shooter At War
description:
Get ready for an all out combat shoot em up. In this action packed sniper shooter, you are the last of an elite seal team dropped in a "hot zone" and you're only mission now is to get out alive! Do you have what it takes?

FEATURES

- Non stop action.
- Awesome sound track.
- "In your face" enemy attacks!
